main.name: Manish Sondhi
main.description: I am a User Experience Designer and a Front-end Developer
main.bio: Hi there! I am Manish! I've worked with startup and large corperations to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realized my passion as becoming an UI/UX Engineer.

education.description: Graduated with a great learning experience in Information Technology

work.title: UI/UX Engineer
work.description: Keep abreast of industry trends and advancements, make a list of potential users, ensure digital user-specific experiences, use flowcharts, graphic designs, storyboards, and site maps, provide direction on UX research, defend against competitors, test user interface components, create and execute solutions, produce automated toolkits, and utilize metrics to determine viability of new projects. Regularly evaluate their own and team's work processes, produce design specifications, unit testing, and technical documentation, formulating and envisioning a thorough UI/UX design approach, creating UI components and tools, testing user interface (UI) components, working together to create and deliver custom digital user experiences, giving suggestions and direction for using UX research methodology and testing procedures, adhering to typographic and graphic design standards, developing and maintaining applications using JSX, React.JS, Micro-Frontend, React-router, Forms, Events, Keys, Router, and Jest. Involve yourself in all aspects of design, development, and testing daily. Test the responsiveness of the program for the end user.

work.title: UI/UX Engineer
work.description: Creating rapid prototypes to validate design concepts, leading/facilitating design activities and prototype workshops, talking to users and other stakeholders to gather needs, guiding conversations to develop and validate UI concepts and metaphors, working with front-end UI analysis, user/task analysis, and interviewing, using Adobe XD to build high-fidelity prototypes based on user demands and business objectives, working closely with development teams to make sure designs are technically feasible within authorized frameworks, and supporting the execution of UI concepts and design approaches.

work.title: Teller & Customer Service Representative (CSR)
work.description: I was responsible for ensuring that client assets are protected by opening and closing accounts in compliance with established operational rules. They are also responsible for managing and maintaining client account information using the new accounts system database. The Tellers aggressively cross-sell new and existing items and services to present and future clients, and use marketing strategies to establish connections.

Quote.text: Work harder than the other person in the room no matter how hard it is get the work done and give everything you have in you toward the work you really love.
I’m not a great programmer; I’m just a good programmer with great habits.
Real programmers can write assembly code in any language.
People ignore design that ignores people.
